game.name: Water Slide Car Stunt Racing Game 3D
game.description:
Are you a car racing fanatic? Is water sliding one of your favourite things to do during your leisure hours? If so, you have reached out at the right place. We have today got you covered with a brand new racing game where you have to control a car on the cool water tracks. Hey! You are not alone, but multiple racers will be there to challenge you. Grab your car, tighten your seatbelt and get ready to enter the highly addictive and competitive car race in a water slide!

Be careful as your rivals are very fast so do not take your fingers off the up arrow keys until you finish the race! It is true that you would have multiple obstacles to face off during the competition in this HTML5 car game. Choose anyone out of the survival and stunts mode and there are 10 unique and challenging levels to play through in each mode! Control the balance and speed of your car when the steep turns come for its survival!

You would be given multiple chances to perform crazy stunts in this cool car stunt simulator game. There are different amazing categories like race with super-fast speed cars to enjoy on the awesome water tracks. Drive as fast as you can to secure the first position and win each level! Defeat all your opponents to complete missions and earn points and buy new car models from the garage! No need to get scared of the twisted extreme track, win the race and prove the world that you are a true slide stunt hero! Good luck to have great fun on this new racing adventure!
